data.title: Meh....and they close at 9:00 on a Saturday
data.text:
It was okay.  Nothing special about this place.  It feels like a bowling alley and the food is even worse than what you'd get in one. It's food, and it provided sustenance, but that's it. We ordered garlic bread, and it was underwhelming. The frozen garlic bread you can buy in the grocery store is better.  The pizza was nothing to phone home about. They use canned mushrooms, and the crust is strange and lacking flavor. 

Another downside is this place closes at 9:00 on Saturday. Maybe that should have been a sign that it was not impressive.

A highlight....the service was good, but I suspect that's because we were there at 8:15, and they wanted to get us out of there. 

My take away, chain places are better. Stick with dominos or Pizza Hut for better pizza.  If you don't mind either way, you might be fine with this place.

data.title: Good pizza and decent salad bar
data.text: Nice little treasure buried in the depths of Dubuque.  You head to the basement, open the door and find a nice little pizza place.  They have really good pizza and a pretty decent salad bar as well.

data.title: Great food, great service!
data.text: We were looking for a family friendly restaurant and hit the jackpot with this one! The atmosphere was comfortable and the food was delicious. Our waitress, Candy, was very personable and fun, as well! We'll definitely return next time we are in Dubuque!

data.title: Excellent pizza & service
data.text: We were looking for a good pizza and this place was recommended by another local resident. Staff was friendly and thin-crust pizza was excellent.

data.title: Great food. Friendly Staff. Good for the family.
data.text: We have been here several times. Once for a birthday party, which was great as they have a side room for some privacy. It is a favorite of our family to enjoy pizza and a nice family environment. Great service from the friendly staff makes for a great experience.

data.title: Wonderful
data.text: Wonderful service & food. We had the buffet and between three people, we an vouch for the soup, salad, pizza and dessert pizza! Candy was our server and she was great! So glad we stopped here for lunch!

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us! We are happy to hear your experience was wonderful, thank you for letting us know that Candy did a good job! Have a great trip.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Friendly Family Staff
data.text: Town Clock is a Dubuque gem in Family restaurants.  I enjoy the friendly staff and great chicken bacon ranch pizza with tomatoes they produce. Anyone traveling in the tri-state area needs to stop and visist.

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your review, we are grateful to have so many loyal customers.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome pizza and friendly staff!
data.text: Always have great service and the pizza is awesome! Staff is very friendly and our waitress, Holly, did a great job providing timely service!

data.title: Loved the pizza!
data.text:
Had 2 large deep dish pizzas - four different types. Good crust, loved the toppings and good amount of cheese.
Common appetizers. Good, came out fast.

data.title: Fantastic pizza
data.text: Went for the lunch buffet, there wasn't much of a selection so I asked my server if more was coming and she told me yes but I could also request a pizza so I did. Shortly after I made my request the pizza buffet was full and my server brought my requested pizza right to me! So delicious and good service,  I will be back.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: One of the better Pizza places in Dubuque, IA.  Also, Pizza Special nights.  Great place for a group as well as for one or two people.

data.title: Great pizza and fantastic service!
data.text: Our waitress, Holly, was great. She made sure that we received everything that we wanted promptly. They even made a special pizza for us!

data.title: awesome lunch buffet
data.text: I work down town and eat here a lot for their great lunch buffet.  Great salad bar, with pizza and soup-  Everyone is very friendly and Candy is the best!

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking time out of your day to review Town Clock Inn. I am so happy that your are able to enjoy the buffet often, we do take requests for hot, fresh pizza & we have nightly specials as well. Hope to see you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Personal service
data.text: The pizza (especially) and salad bar is delicious. The server actually says, "If you like a certain kind of pizza, and you don't see it out here, tell me and we'll make one for you." I did that today, and, when the Taco Pizza was out of the oven, she came to our table to deliver some slices.

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review Town Clock Inn, I am so, so happy to hear that you were satisfied with our lunch buffet. We do take requests and it is our goal that you enjoy the first hot, fresh slice of your choice!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best pizza in town
data.text:
Gem of a place. 

Good atmosphere, friendly workers makes it a must stop in when visiting Dubuque or just a night on the town. Very good pizza one of the best in Dubuque.

Locally owned and operated.

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you, we appreciate you comments and we look forward to serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome pizza!
data.text: We visit the Town Clock Inn for pizza on a regular basis.  We always know what to expect- great pizza, friendly and quick service. The pizza is always hot and fresh and we don't have to wait for a long time for service.  All of the staff knows us by name and are very friendly and efficient.  Holly was our server on this visit, and as always she took great care of us.

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you, we are grateful to have loyal customers like you. We appreciate your trust in our food and our staff and we look forward to serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great pizza
data.text: Great pizza friendly staff great hometown feel !!!  We stop in at least once a month buffet or dinner

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review Town Clock Inn, I hope that when you get the Lunch Buffet you request your favorite pizza? We love serving everyone there favorite pizza, maybe you can help us create a new one?
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hasn't Changed A Bit
data.text: I worked at the Town Clock Inn 20 years ago when Stephanie Nelson owned the restaurant. Now, Scott, her son, owns the restaurant and I am pleased to say after all of these years the food hasn't changed a bit. There is a slight increase in prices since I worked here, but only to ensure that they still use the same quality ingredients which my family loves. It's a wonderful place to have gatherings when family comes from out of town. It works out really well to put all of our pizzas on one check and have them set up in a buffet style for our family and everyone chips in at the end of the night. Family owned, delicious pizza always!

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review, we try very hard to keep our food consistent by making everything the same way as our family once did. We are grateful that you enjoy large family gatherings down here, we are happy to do all the cooking and cleaning for any large gathering, we look forward to serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great pizza, better service!
data.text: I went to Town Clock Inn last weekend for the first time not knowing what to expect, but I had heard the pizza was what to get. I went with the BBQ Chicken pizza. It was a chicago-style pizza and it was nothing less than awesome. The service is what made the experience that much better. I believe my server was Hanna. She was very friendly and made sure my MTD was never even close to empty. I will definitely be going back!

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our restaurant, we are very happy to hear Hannah took good care of you, thank you for letting us know! Good service is something we strive hard to achieve. I would suggest next time adding pineapple to the BBQ Chicken Pizza for that extra something special!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Pizza, Excellent Service
data.text: I have tried several different kinds of pizza, but I have found my absolute favorite. Hannah is a wonderful server and can always talk you into adding some kick to your pizza. You must try to chicken bacon ranch pizza but you need to add jalapenos! If you aren't a fan of the heat there are plenty of other options. I also love to start off with an assorted basket, which means I have some pizza left over for the next day!

owner_response.author: Irene J, Owner at Town Clock Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our restaurant. I agree with you that jalapenos added a special kick to everything! We look forward to serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
